This website uses the following platforms and frameworks: 
<!--more-->

This website uses the following platforms and frameworks:  
\

1. [Hugo ](https://gohugo.io) - open source static site generator
2. [Hugo Tranquilpeak Theme](https://themes.gohugo.io/hugo-tranquilpeak-theme/) - a custom template to personolize the website
3. [R Studio Desktop](https://rstudio.com/products/rstudio/) - an integrated development Environment (IDE) for R
4. [R Blogdown](https://bookdown.org/yihui/blogdown/) - open source R package to generate static websites based on R and Hugo
5. [R Markdown](https://rmarkdown.rstudio.com) to write, analyze and share posts
6. [Github](https://github.com) for hosting the website code and version control
7. [Netlify](https://www.netlify.com) to deploy using continuous integration with Github
